ai.summary: Forest Walk is a 10.8 km moderate hike through UK forest trails. Expect shaded paths, gentle elevation, and peaceful woodland scenery suitable for walkers with comfortable footwear and a few hours to spare.
ai.terrain_summary: The route follows forest tracks with a mix of dirt and gravel surfaces. Expect occasional roots, gentle elevation changes, and potential muddy patches after rain. Trails are generally well-marked and suitable for a casual day out.
ai.safety_notes: Check local weather and daylight hours before starting. Wear sturdy footwear and bring layers. In UK forests be mindful of ticks, uneven ground, and seasonal hazards. Carry a map or GPS, a fully charged phone, water, snacks, and notify someone of your planned return. Avoid the forest after heavy rain if paths are flooded.
recommended_gear: Map and compass or GPS-enabled device
Headlamp or flashlight (in case of delays)
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn; the hike is comfortable in mild weather, though it can be done year-round with proper gear.

seo.title: Forest Walk - 10.8 km Moderate UK Forest Hike
